top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Features lively squares like Place Flagey, full of cafes and restaurants.
Known for its diverse expat community and vibrant cultural events.
watch_out: Watch out for high property prices in sought-after streets.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Close to the dynamic Parvis de Saint-Gilles, filled with dining options.
Home to a growing number of cafes and multicultural activities.
watch_out: Parking can be challenging due to high demand in the area.

top_districts.name: Schaerbeek
why: Offers green spaces like Josaphat Park, ideal for relaxation.
Hosts various expat-friendly events throughout the year.
watch_out: Commute times may be longer compared to more central districts.
